publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5814 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to The Peat Inn—That the Parliament congratulates The Peat Inn, St Andrews, on being named the restaurant of the year at the prestigious Scottish Restaurant Awards; further commends its owner, Geoffrey Smeddle, on being named chef of the year, and considers that, yet again, North East Fife has demonstrated its culinary and hospitality excellence.

S3M-5814 Congratulations to The Peat Inn (lodged on 24 February 2010) Iain Smith*, Brian Adam*, John Lamont*, Claire Baker*, Elizabeth Smith*, Jamie McGrigor*, Rob Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Margaret Mitchell*, Nanette Milne*, Murdo Fraser*, Bill Aitken*, Bill Kidd*, Jackson Carlaw*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Stuart McMillan*, John Park*

S3M-5814 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to The Peat Inn—That the Parliament congratulates The Peat Inn, St Andrews, on being named the restaurant of the year at the prestigious Scottish Restaurant Awards; further commends its owner, Geoffrey Smeddle, on being named chef of the year, and considers that, yet again, North East Fife has demonstrated its culinary and hospitality excellence. Supported by: Iain Smith, Brian Adam, John Lamont, Claire Baker, Elizabeth Smith, Jamie McGrigor, Rob Gibson, Joe FitzPatrick, Bob Doris, Sandra White, Margaret Mitchell, Nanette Milne, Murdo Fraser, Bill Aitken, Bill Kidd, Jackson Carlaw, Dr Richard Simpson, Stuart McMillan, John Park, Mary Scanlon*, Robin Harper*
